info.header: RSLTE036 - Congestion per QoS classes per VLAN
info.csv_title: Congestion per QoS classes per VLAN
info.help_text:
Congestion analysis report shows dropped packets and volume per VLAN per hope behaviour class (from class 4 to best effort).
This report is divided in the following groups:
- Percentage of packets ,per VLAN, PHB to send Drop Rate due to congestion;
- Data Volume lost ,per VLAN, PHB to send due to congestion;
info.report-description: Congestion per QoS classes per VLAN
